ad_context:
Exclusive Representation Annoucement ｜獨家代理宣布
-
C平方畫廊（C Square Gallery）宣布—獨家代理藝術家 蔡尉成

C平方畫廊開心宣布與當代藝術家蔡尉成簽定全球代理合約，蔡尉成是當前最受矚目且具高知名度的台灣藝術家之一，因創作獨特的視覺語言而廣受讚譽。這份重要的合約所帶來的機會將使蔡尉成的作品更廣泛地進入國際藝術市場，並為其全新系列作品的發表奠定堅實的基礎，標誌著其藝術生涯的新篇章，更標誌著C平方準備進一步拓展視野及業務，使藝術家蔡尉成於國際上，能具有更高知名度及範疇。

完整新聞稿：
https://www.csquareart.com/cai-wei-cheng/%E8%94%A1%E5%B0%89%E6%88%90%E9%A0%90%E7%B4%84
-
C Square Gallery Announces Exclusive Representation of Artist Tsai Wei-Cheng

C Square Gallery is delighted to announce the signing of a global representation agreement with contemporary artist Tsai Wei-Cheng, one of Taiwan’s most prominent and widely recognized artists. Celebrated for his distinctive visual language, Tsai’s works have captivated audiences and collectors alike. This significant partnership will expand his presence in the international art market, laying a solid foundation for the debut of his latest series. It marks a new chapter in Tsai’s artistic career and reflects C Square Gallery’s commitment to broadening its vision and operations, elevating Tsai’s global recognition and influence.

Full release:
https://www.csquareart.com/cai-wei-cheng/%E8%94%A1%E5%B0%89%E6%88%90%E9%A0%90%E7%B4%84
-
2025 年 3 月 15 日始，蔡尉成全新「成相非象」系列即將於C平方畫廊 2 樓展出，歡迎預約參觀。

預約連結：
https://www.csquareart.com/service-page/tsai-wei-cheng-private-exhibition-1
-
We invite art enthusiasts to stay tuned for more updates and to schedule a private viewing of Tsai Wei-Cheng’s "Phenomenon vs. Illusion" series. Join us in celebrating this extraordinary artistic journey and witnessing Tsai Wei-Cheng's ascent in the global art market at C Square Gallery on the 2nd floor. Please make an appointment through our website.

ad_title: Tsai Wei-Cheng Private Exhibition | C square gallery
